issue.title: [Rust] Validate temporal data that has restrictions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10925](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10925). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some temporal data types have restrictions (e.g. date64 should be a multiple of 86400000). We should validate them when creating the arrays.
